scripts.run:mount: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; if (docker ps -a --format '{{.Names}}' | Select-String -Pattern '^scheduler-mounted$' -Quiet) { docker stop scheduler-mounted | Out-Null; docker rm scheduler-mounted | Out-Null }; if (-not (docker volume ls --format '{{.Name}}' | Select-String -Pattern '^scheduler_node_modules$' -Quiet)) { docker volume create scheduler_node_modules | Out-Null }; docker run -d --rm --name scheduler-mounted -p 8899:8899 --mount type=bind,source=$PWD,target=/app --mount type=volume,source=scheduler_node_modules,target=/app/node_modules --entrypoint sh scheduler:local -c 'if [ ! -f /app/node_modules/.linux-built ]; then npm ci --omit=dev && touch /app/node_modules/.linux-built; fi; node server.js'"
scripts.restart:dock: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; if (docker ps -a --format '{{.Names}}' | Select-String -Pattern '^scheduler-mounted$' -Quiet) { docker restart scheduler-mounted | Out-Null; docker ps --filter name=^/scheduler-mounted$ --format 'restarted {{.Names}} ({{.Status}})' } else { npm run run:mount }"
scripts.deploy:render: node -e "const path=require('path');require('dotenv').config({path:path.join(process.cwd(),'.env')}); const h=(process.env.RENDER_DEPLOY_HOOK||'').trim(); if(!h){console.log('MISSING RENDER_DEPLOY_HOOK'); process.exit(1);} fetch(h).then(r=>{console.log('STATUS',r.status); process.exit(r.ok?0:1);}).catch(e=>{console.error(e.message); process.exit(1);});"
scripts.smoke:all: npm run smoke:auth && npm run smoke:avatar
